languages.text: "Говорят, шестеренки крадут на Футфоле людей и потом приносят в жертву на своей станции у звезды. И как Император такое терпит..."
"They say the cogs kidnap people on Footfall and then sacrifice them on their station near the star. How the Emperor even lets this happen..."
languages.original_text: "Говорят, шестеренки крадут на Футфоле людей и потом приносят в жертву на своей станции у звезды. И как Император такое терпит..."

traits.locale_text: "They say the cogs kidnap people on Footfall and then sacrifice them on their station near the star. How the Emperor even lets this happen..."
"They say the cogs kidnap people on Footfall and then sacrifice them on their station near the star. How the Emperor even lets this happen..."
"They say the cogs kidnap people on Footfall and then sacrifice them on their station near the star. How the Emperor even lets this happen..."

languages.text: “他们说那群人会从落脚港把人绑走，之后在附近的星站上把那些人献祭。帝皇怎么会允许这种事情发生……”
languages.original_text: "They say the cogs kidnap people on Footfall and then sacrifice them on their station near the star. How the Emperor even lets this happen..."

traits.locale_text: “他们说那群人会从落脚港把人绑走，之后在附近的星站上把那些人献祭。帝皇怎么会允许这种事情发生……”

languages.text: «Dicen que los operarios secuestran a gente en Paso y los sacrifican en su estación, más cerca de la estrella. ¿Cómo puede el Emperador dejar que pase esto?...».
languages.original_text: "They say the cogs kidnap people on Footfall and then sacrifice them on their station near the star. How the Emperor even lets this happen..."

traits.locale_text: «Dicen que los operarios secuestran a gente en Paso y los sacrifican en su estación, más cerca de la estrella. ¿Cómo puede el Emperador dejar que pase esto?...».

languages.text: 「歯車がフットフォールで人間を攫い、惑星近くの奴らのステーションで、その人間を生贄にしてるって話だよ。なんで皇帝はこんなことをお許しになるのか…」
languages.original_text: "They say the cogs kidnap people on Footfall and then sacrifice them on their station near the star. How the Emperor even lets this happen..."

traits.locale_text: 「歯車がフットフォールで人間を攫い、惑星近くの奴らのステーションで、その人間を生贄にしてるって話だよ。なんで皇帝はこんなことをお許しになるのか…」

languages.text: "Angeblich entführen die Zahnräder Personen auf Footfall und opfern sie auf ihrer Station in der Nähe des Sterns. Wie kann der Imperator so etwas zulassen ...?"
languages.original_text: "They say the cogs kidnap people on Footfall and then sacrifice them on their station near the star. How the Emperor even lets this happen..."

traits.locale_text: "Angeblich entführen die Zahnräder Personen auf Footfall und opfern sie auf ihrer Station in der Nähe des Sterns. Wie kann der Imperator so etwas zulassen ...?"

languages.text: « On dit que les cogs enlèvent des gens à Castel pour aller les sacrifier sur leur station près de l'étoile. Je ne sais même pas pourquoi l'Empereur les laisse faire... »
languages.original_text: "They say the cogs kidnap people on Footfall and then sacrifice them on their station near the star. How the Emperor even lets this happen..."

traits.locale_text: « On dit que les cogs enlèvent des gens à Castel pour aller les sacrifier sur leur station près de l'étoile. Je ne sais même pas pourquoi l'Empereur les laisse faire... »

languages.text: "Rivayete göre teknikçiler, Binliman sakinlerini kaçırıp yıldızın oradaki istasyonlarında kurban ediyorlarmış. İmparator buna nasıl müsaade ediyor..."
languages.original_text: "They say the cogs kidnap people on Footfall and then sacrifice them on their station near the star. How the Emperor even lets this happen..."

traits.locale_text: "Teknikçiler, rivayete göre Binliman sakinlerini kaçırıp yıldızın oradaki istasyonlarında kurban ediyorlarmış. İmparator buna nasıl müsaade ediyor..."
